description.value:
Ancient Torture device, used for self-penitence. Used in Downtime after a mission is complete, though must be acquired using the requisition for a mission. Entering the Pain Glove allows the character to spend Experience Points to remove Insanity or Corruption, and lose an additional 1d5 Insanity and 1 Corruption when doing so.

Requirements

Imperial Fists Only.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 15 R
